Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm having trouble with air intakes with .90. Whenever I try to attach them with any kind of symmetry, the parts don't attach at all, and if I try again I lose the ability to select and attach parts to the craft and the ability to name the craft. It also will not let me load a craft after attempting to attach the intakes a 2nd time without re-selecting the part, and when I click the New Craft button, the first piece I select appears aligned vertically and halfway embedded into the floor of the hanger and is unmovable.

The only air intake that works is the mk-1 inline intake that I think is from B9.

I have the following mods installed:

B9 aerospace

Cross-feed enabler

Crowd sourced science

deadly reentry

kerbal engineer

evironmental visual enhancements

Kerbal Assembly System

KW rocketry

Realchute

Remote tech

distant objects enhancement

Kerbal alarm clock

Infernal Robotics

Vanguard kerbal parachutes

I would appreciate any help.

i have the exact same issue! my install shares the following mods:

B9 aerospace

Crowd sourced science

kerbal engineer

Realchute

Kerbal alarm clock

Infernal Robotics

Vanguard kerbal parachutes
